cn.sharesdk.wechat.utils

类 WechatHandlerActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • cn.sharesdk.wechat.utils.WechatHandlerActivity
  • 直接已知子类:
    WXEntryActivity

    public class WechatHandlerActivity
extends Activity
    Wechat callback activity

    To integrate Wechat, you have to implements a class in the package of ".wxapi" which extends WechatHandlerActivity and is named as "WXEntryActivity". Wechat client will start this activity after sharing and return share result.

    Most processing logic has been implemented in this class, what subclasses need to do is extends an "empty" class in the right package.

      构造器 
      构造器和说明

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void onGetMessageFromWXReq(WXMediaMessage msg)
      Handling message which sent from wechat This message will be sent from wechat by clicking the app icon at the bottom of the chatting page
      void onShowMessageFromWXReq(WXMediaMessage msg)
      Handling message which sent from wechat This message will be sent from wechat by chlicking this app-type message in the chatting list
